org.apache.flink.runtime.blob

类 BlobKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.blob.BlobKey
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<BlobKey>
    直接已知子类:
    PermanentBlobKey, TransientBlobKey

    abstract class BlobKey
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<BlobKey>
    A BLOB key uniquely identifies a BLOB.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      (专用程序包) static class  BlobKey.BlobType
      BLOB type, i.e. permanent or transient.

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      private byte[] key
      The byte buffer storing the actual key data.
      private AbstractID random
      Random component of the key.
      private static long serialVersionUID 
      static int SIZE
      Size of the internal BLOB key in bytes.
      private BlobKey.BlobType type
      (Internal) BLOB type - to be reflected by the inheriting sub-class.

    • 构造器概要

      Constructs a new BLOB key.

      protected BlobKey(BlobKey.BlobType type, byte[] key, byte[] random)
      Constructs a new BLOB key from the given byte array.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • BlobKey

        protected BlobKey(BlobKey.BlobType type)
        Constructs a new BLOB key.
        参数:
        type - whether the referenced BLOB is permanent or transient

      • BlobKey

        protected BlobKey(BlobKey.BlobType type,
                  byte[] key)
        Constructs a new BLOB key from the given byte array.
        参数:
        type - whether the referenced BLOB is permanent or transient
        key - the actual key data

      • BlobKey

        protected BlobKey(BlobKey.BlobType type,
                  byte[] key,
                  byte[] random)
        Constructs a new BLOB key from the given byte array.
        参数:
        type - whether the referenced BLOB is permanent or transient
        key - the actual key data
        random - the random component of the key

static BlobKey createKey(BlobKey.BlobType type)

        返回:
        BlobKey subclass

      • createKey

        static BlobKey createKey(BlobKey.BlobType type,
                         byte[] key,
                         byte[] random)
        Returns the right BlobKey subclass for the given parameters.
        参数:
        type - whether the referenced BLOB is permanent or transient
        key - the actual key data
        random - the random component of the key
        返回:
        BlobKey subclass

      • getHash

        @VisibleForTesting
public byte[] getHash()
        Returns the hash component of this key.
        返回:
        a 20 bit hash of the contents the key refers to

      • getType

        BlobKey.BlobType getType()
        Returns the (internal) BLOB type which is reflected by the inheriting sub-class.
        返回:
        BLOB type, i.e. permanent or transient

      • addToMessageDigest

        public void addToMessageDigest(java.security.MessageDigest md)
        Adds the BLOB key to the given MessageDigest.
        参数:
        md - the message digest to add the BLOB key to

      • readFromInputStream

        static BlobKey readFromInputStream(java.io.InputStream inputStream)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        Auxiliary method to read a BLOB key from an input stream.
        参数:
        inputStream - the input stream to read the BLOB key from
        返回:
        the read BLOB key
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - throw if an I/O error occurs while reading from the input stream

      • writeToOutputStream

        void writeToOutputStream(java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        Auxiliary method to write this BLOB key to an output stream.
        参数:
        outputStream - the output stream to write the BLOB key to
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if an I/O error occurs while writing the BLOB key
